meta.description: Marhaba Lounge at Dubai International Airport (DXB), Terminal 3, Concourse B. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Marhaba Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Level 4, near Gate B21, entrance is right after XpresSpa.

lounge.description: Relax in style and enjoy the unique Arabian hospitality at this spacious, comfortable oasis before your departure. Set yourself free from the boisterous throngs of travelers waiting outside. Enjoy fast Wi-Fi, front row runway views, a diverse culinary selection to satisfy your palate, and great service. Ideal for leisure and business travellers alike, perfect during stopovers.

general: Children under 2 years old are admitted free with an adult.
regulatory: This lounge is only accessible for passengers departing from Terminal 3.

reviews.content: The service was the only thing that this lounge had going good for it. However the workers were very much too laid back for a full day at the lounge. We ended up leaving after 5-10 mins after we entered.
Waste of money! Staff at front desk were rude. Very small choice of food.
Very basic food meh but nice being separated.
Has the basic necessities to wait for next flight.
Food and drink both need some help (no wine when I was there). Was able to find a quiet spot but the lounge was pretty busy around 7am.
OK lounge. OK food selection. Drinks selection seemed mediocre. Quite an open space, you'd struggle to rest or nap in here.
Food is good but crowded when I visited.
Can be very busy. But go beyond the toilets and it may be quieter. Perfectly adequate for PP inclusive.
Very crowded. I have been there before ten days, I found that they did not change the food options.
Paid 195 Dirham for access to this lounge. Used the Marhaba lounge once before - lounge around B20s. gates. Anyway, decent enough. Had a 6 hrs stop over (Emirates economy). Worth it.
Good for a non-member lounge. Service was good, connectivity good and food (curries) was delicious.
Decent food and drink selection and seating options. My only gripe is lack of available places to plug in.
Really good selection of food to be a third lounge. Good option for Emirates travelers who have time at the airport but do not have access to Emirates' own lounges in terminal 3.
Small lounge. Used it when passing through en route from New Zealand to UK. Good. Enough for quick shower, food was basic but edible. Staff friendly enough.
Service desk not friendly, not happy faces. Felt like they were doing me a favor
Of the half a dozen or so lounges that i have been to, this one had the best food. The lounge is small but very well kept. Overall great.

location.terminalDirections: Arrivals Area.

otherLounges.name: Their Patio by Plaza Premium Group

location.terminalDirections: Located in the arrivals area after exiting baggage claim.
Take the lift located next to the souvenir shop to Level 6. Located prior to Gates A1-A12.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located between Gates A1 and A24 to the Hotel Reception on Level 6.
Level 4, between Gates A1 and A24.
Level 5, between Gates A2 and A3. Entrance is via dedicated elevator from the perfume area of the Duty Free Area.
Located in the West Wing of Concourse A, between Gates A2 and A3. Take the lift from the Duty Free Area to the entrance on Level 4.
Opposite Gate A1 in the Duty Free Area.
5th Floor, between Gates A1 and A24
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located near Gates B14 or B22 to the Hotel Reception.
4th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18, near the Information Desk.

otherLounges.name: Lounge @ B (Closed for Renovation, Temp Lounge at Gate B22)

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate B26, above McDonald's on the 2nd Floor, accessible via escalator, entrance is located inside the Cadiz Tapas Bar.

otherLounges.name: Sleep n' Fly Sleep Lounge, Business Pods and Showers

location.terminalDirections: Located between Gates B14 and B18, close to the Emirates Connections Desk.
5th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18.
Located next to Gate C13.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the escalators or elevators located between Gates C15 and C17 to the Hotel Reception.
East End of Concourse C, between Gates C21 and C23.

C-Gates, Central Lower Level Duty Free Area. Lounge check-in is via the separate main reception at departure gate level next to Gate C14. The sleep 'n fly lounge is located one level down in the Duty Free Area.
Near Gate C8.
Near Gate C28.
